thread.title: New Orleans parade: Dozen critically injured after car ploughs into crowd watching Mardi Gras
thread.title_full: New Orleans parade: Dozen critically injured after car ploughs into crowd watching Mardi Gras

author: Steve Robson
title: New Orleans parade: Dozen critically injured after car ploughs into crowd watching Mardi Gras
text:
The scene in New Orleans where a dozen people are injured after a car ploughed into crowds Share Get daily   
At least a dozen people have been critically injured after a car ploughed into a crowd watching a Mardi Gras parade in New Orleans. 
The crash was reported at about 6:45 p.m. at Carrollton and Orleans avenues. 
"Initial reports show so far about a dozen people are in critical condition," a police spokeswoman told the New Orleans Advocate. 
"That number could increase as the investigation is ongoing." 
The incident happened on the route of the Krewe of Endymion parade, according to reports. 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
